QuestData.Title: Master the Storm
QuestData.Description: From what you describe, the creatures of metal should be easy to deal with. But first, you must master the storm.$B$BBehind me in the lodge is a totem. When you are ready, focus your will upon it and the storm will come. You must defeat the storm and in so doing take its essence into yourself.$B$BIf others are there, it is enough that you all work together to defeat it. Return to me after, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Storm Tempest and then return to Sage Earth and Sky at Taunka'le Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you mastered the storm yet?
QuestData.RewardText: I feel the power of the storm coursing through you!$B$BYou are ready, $n. Let us begin.
